explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of machine learning (ML) techniques to predict the levelized cost of electricity (LCOE) for photovoltaic systems.
explanations.regression: The paper discusses the use of the auto-regression integration moving average (ARIMA) model, which is a type of regression model, for predicting consumer electricity prices.
explanations.ARIMA: The paper specifically highlights the use of the ARIMA model for predicting electricity prices, achieving a high accuracy of 93.8%.
